name: Black and Green Tickld
description:
It's different than the "Night Mode" on Tickld, as this is not only darker, but more thorough, and most text is either grey or green. Also, I try to keep the ads off the page (they change the tags all the time).

Please let me know if there are any issues with it, I will fix it ASAP.

Also, let people know about this- I'd like to see how the general Tickld community takes to this :)
additional_info:
Version 1.3
Release Date: 10/6/2013
v1.1- Chrome and FireFox
v1.2- Tickld changed some of the tags, updated to keep the look
v1.3- Fixed the black "Reply/Report/Gift Karma" buttons
v1.4, v1.5- Kept the ads at bay, they keep trying to make them come back

discussions.name: Good, but it should work in Firefox too (fixed; thank you)
